Rulings.Base:
1. You can only Special Summon this card with its effect during your Main Phases.
2. Special Summoning this card with its effect does not start a Chain.
3. If the conditions are met, you can Special Summon multiple copies of Brisote during the same turn.
4. It doesn't matter if your 'Blackwing' monsters are destroyed by battle, card effects, or both. As long as 2 or more face-up 'Blackwing' monsters were destroyed, you can Special Summon this card.
5. It doesn't matter which player destroys the face-up 'Blackwing' monsters. As long as 2 or more were destroyed, you can Special Summon this card.
6. You don't need to have this card in your hand when the monsters are destroyed in order to Special Summon it. If you draw it later in the turn due to "Allure of Darkness" you can still Special Summon it as long as 2 or more of your face-up 'Blackwing' monsters were destroyed.
